name: Basketball Sports
description:
Big fan of basketball sport but don’t have chance to go out to play? Come and join us in Basketball! Basketball is a super enjoyable and addictive retro sports game. Fling the ball and make amazing basketball shots. Be the basketball star!

------------ Basketball Features ------------
- Easy and fun to control yet challenging to fully master
- Super real physics simulation, enjoy 1st class shooting experience
- Impressive and realistic 3D artwork
- Multiple difficulty modes with varying challenges, fun for EVERYONE
- Play WHEREVER and WHENEVER you want: Can even be played without Internet

------------ How to Play ------------
- Tap on the ball to touch it
- Adjust the shooting angle by dragging the ball
- Release the ball and fling it to the basket

Tips: Shoot balls into the hoop as fast as you can, you will be rewarded!

Challenge yourself by changing distance, obstacles and moving loops as you want and enjoy Basketball!
